Fannie Mae.translation[0].definitions[0]: a US financial institution which buys and sells loans and mortgages to banks and other institutions, but does not deal directly with ordinary borrowers. Its full name is the Federal National Mortgage Association (FNMA).
Fannie Mae.translation[1].definitions[0]: an informal name for the FEDERAL NATIONAL MORTGAGE ASSOCIATION
Fannie Mae.translation[1].definitions[1]: bonds issued by the Fannie Mae
